name: Nude Ninja
description:
★★★ 70% OFF From 2.99 to 0.99 ★★★

★★★ Nude Ninja! ★★★
The No.1 Nude Ninjia game in appstore!

In ancient Japan, there are two famous Ninja villages. The Ninja War between them occurs in years.

One of them, Fire Ninja Village master the Ninja Blade. And this year, the Ninja Blade is inherited by one teenage Ninja Miss Lara.

The enemy - Water Ninja Village want to steal the Ninja Blade. They do any way they could including the opportunities when Miss Lara walking, eating, even bathing... Yes! Miss Lara must fight even with nothing wearing! That's Ninja's spirits!

The new Ninja Fight will begin at any time.

★★★★★

"Nude Ninja" features hours of gameplay, challenging reflect speed, and lots of replay value.

We’d like to take this opportunity to extend our infinite gratitude to friends of our "Nude Ninja" everywhere. We thank you sincerely from the bottoms of our fluffy hearts for making "Nude Ninja" the highest rated and best selling game ever on iTunes!

With loads of exciting and devilishly tricky gameplay, "Nude Ninja" guarantees you many hours of fun.

★★★★★ ADDICTIVE FEATURES ★★★★★

• RACING AND ACTION GAMEPLAY
- Gorgeous interface style
- Fun game set
- Simple and familiar gameplay you know and love
- Experience great pleasure in revenge
- Fun for the whole family to play game

• SPEED AND SPEED UP MODES FOR DOUBLE THE FUN
At the next, next wave, more speed and more clever for game

• Access your games across your iPhone, and/or iPod touch

• Remember, positive reviews keep the updates coming!
